description.raw:
I made a rookie mistake of not properly framing the discovery messages in pull request #403.

This PR adds framing, where a `uint16_t` number that contains the size of the protobuf message is prefixed to each discovery message.

In previous versions of Ignition Transport, the frame header was the size of the message + size of the header. 

I choose a different header number so that we can determine incompatible discovery messages in both Ignition Transport 8+ and Ignition Transport <=7.

Please read the large documentation block in this PR for more information.

# To Test

1. Install both Ignition Transport 7 and Ignition Transport 8.
2. Run the `examples/plublisher` and `examples/subscriber` in both versions of Ignition Transport simultaneously. You should not see cross talk. For example, running the version7 publisher should not cause the version8 subscriber to print "HELLO".
